Object.Field: <map-generation-info> <node name="W_ORDERS_F" type="IKM" km="IKM Oracle Partition Exchange Load.Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo"> <option name="Partition Name" value="#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH" default="false"/> <option name="Exchange Type" value="PARTITION" default="true"/> <option name="Degree of Parallelism" value="PARALLEL" default="true"/> <option name="Select Optimizer Hint" value="#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT" default="false"/> <option name="Flow Control" value="false" default="false"/> <option name="Lock Partition" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Partition Exchange Options" value="WITHOUT VALIDATION" default="false"/> <option name="Set Incremental Statistics" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Set Publish Statistics" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Disable Constraints Before Exchange" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="Rebuild Local Indexes" value="true" default="false"/> <option name="Rebuild Global Indexes" value="true" default="false"/> <option name="Enable Constraints After Exchange" value="true" default="false"/> <option name="Gather Table Statistics" value="true" default="false"/> <option name="Delete Temporary Objects" value="true" default="true"/> </node> <node name="W_ORDERS_F" type="CKM" km="CKM Oracle.Oracle Partition Exchange Load Demo"> <option name="DROP_ERROR_TABLE" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="DROP_CHECK_TABLE" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="CREATE_ERROR_INDEX" value="true" default="true"/> <option name="COMPATIBLE" value="9" default="true"/> <option name="VALIDATE" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT" value="false" default="true"/> <option name="UPGRADE_ERROR_TABLE" value="false" default="true"/> </node> <target name="W_ORDERS_F" resource="W_ORDERS_F" model="FACTS" logicalSchema="Warehouse" forcedContext=""/> </map-generation-info>
Add Not Null to flow table
Create local indexes on flow table

--SET SERVEROUTPUT ON; DECLARE c_count NUMBER := 0; BEGIN FOR TableLocalCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, sp.subpartition_position, sp.subpartition_name, sp.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) JOIN all_ind_subpartitions sp ON (ip.partition_name = sp.partition_name AND ip.index_name = sp.index_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' <$ String PartitionExchangeType; PartitionExchangeType = "PARTITION"; if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("PARTITION")) { $> AND tp.partition_name ='<$="#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH"$>' <$ } if ((PartitionExchangeType.toUpperCase()).equals("SUBPARTITION")) { $> AND sp.subpartition_name ='<$="#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH"$>' <$ } $> AND ip.composite = 'YES' ORDER BY sp.subpartition_position ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY SUBPARTITION '||TableLocalCompositeIndex.subpartition_name||' REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); c_count := c_count + 1; END LOOP; IF c_count = 0 THEN FOR TableLocalNonCompositeIndex IN (SELECT tp.table_owner, tp.table_name, tp.partition_name, ip.index_name index_name, ip.composite, ip.status FROM all_tab_partitions tp JOIN all_ind_partitions ip ON (tp.partition_name = ip.partition_name) JOIN all_indexes dx ON (ip.index_name = dx.index_name AND dx.table_owner = tp.table_owner AND dx.table_name = tp.table_name) WHERE tp.table_owner ='<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND tp.table_name ='W_ORDERS_F' AND tp.partition_name ='<$="#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH"$>' AND ip.composite = 'NO' ) LOOP --dbms_output.put_line('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); EXECUTE IMMEDIATE('ALTER TABLE <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.W_ORDERS_F MODIFY PARTITION <$="#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH"$> REBUILD UNUSABLE LOCAL INDEXES'); END LOOP; END IF; END;
Rebuild local indexes on partitioned table

DECLARE c_fk_name varchar2(30) := ''; BEGIN c_fk_name := '<?= odiRef.getObjectShortName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?>'; IF length(c_fk_name) > 24 THEN c_fk_name := SUBSTR(c_fk_name,1,24); END IF; c_fk_name := c_fk_name||'_FK'; FOR TableConstraint IN ( SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUMBER, c2.column_name, C4.OWNER FK_OWNER, c4.table_name FK_TABLE, c4.column_name FK_COLUMN FROM all_CONSTRAINTS C1 INNER JOIN all_cons_columns C2 ON (c1.constraint_name=c2.constraint_name AND c1.table_name =c2.table_name AND c1.owner = c2.owner) INNER JOIN all_CONSTRAINTS C3 ON (c3.constraint_name = c1.r_constraint_name AND C1.OWNER = C3.OWNER) INNER JOIN all_CONS_COLUMNS C4 ON (c3.constraint_name =c4.constraint_name AND c3.table_name =c4.table_name AND c3.owner = c4.owner) WHERE C1.TABLE_NAME ='W_ORDERS_F' AND c1.owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND C1.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'R' AND C1.STATUS = 'ENABLED' ORDER BY c1.constraint_name, c2.position ) LOOP EXECUTE immediate 'alter table <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> add constraint '||c_fk_name||TO_CHAR(TableConstraint.ROW_NUMBER)||' foreign key ("'||TableConstraint.COLUMN_NAME||'") references "'||TableConstraint.FK_OWNER||'"."'||TableConstraint.FK_TABLE||'" ("'||TableConstraint.FK_COLUMN||'")'; END LOOP; END;

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "%INT_PRFW_ORDERS_F%UNIQUE_STEP_TAG", "W") ?> select <$="#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT"$> ORDERS_1.ORDER_NUM, ORDERS_1.ORDER_DT, W_STATUS_D.ROW_WID, W_CUSTOMER_D_1.ROW_WID, W_PRODUCT_D.ROW_WID, ORDERS_1.PRICE * ORDERS_1.QUANTITY, ORDERS_1.CREATED_DT, ORDERS_1.UPDATED_DT from ((( SELECT ORDERS.ORDER_NUM ORDER_NUM , ORDERS.ORDER_DT ORDER_DT , ORDERS.ORDER_STATUS ORDER_STATUS , ORDERS.CUST_ID CUST_ID , ORDERS.PROD_ID PROD_ID , ORDERS.QUANTITY QUANTITY , ORDERS.PRICE PRICE , ORDERS.CREATED_DT CREATED_DT , ORDERS.UPDATED_DT UPDATED_DT FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "ORDERS", "Staging", "D") ?> ORDERS WHERE (ORDERS.ORDER_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE('#A_TEAM.PARTITION_MONTH','#A_TEAM.PartitionDateFormat')) AND '#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT' = '#A_TEAM.FLOW_TABLE_OPTIMIZER_HINT' ) ) ORDERS_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_STATUS_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_STATUS_D ON ORDERS_1.ORDER_STATUS = W_STATUS_D.STATUS_CD ) LEFT OUTER JOIN <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_PRODUCT_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_PRODUCT_D ON ORDERS_1.PROD_ID = W_PRODUCT_D.PROD_ID ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT W_CUSTOMER_D.ROW_WID ROW_WID , W_CUSTOMER_D.CUST_ID CUST_ID , W_CUSTOMER_D.CURRENT_FLAG CURRENT_FLAG FROM <?= odiRef.getObjectName("L", "W_CUSTOMER_D", "Warehouse", "D") ?> W_CUSTOMER_D WHERE (W_CUSTOMER_D.CURRENT_FLAG = #A_TEAM.DefaultType2CurrentFlag ) ) W_CUSTOMER_D_1 ON ORDERS_1.CUST_ID = W_CUSTOMER_D_1.CUST_ID where (1=1)

-- Rebuild Global Indexes BEGIN FOR GlobalIndexes IN (SELECT INDEX_NAME FROM ALL_INDEXES WHERE TABLE_OWNER = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND TABLE_NAME = 'W_ORDERS_F' AND PARTITIONED = 'NO' AND STATUS ='UNUSABLE' ) LOOP EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'ALTER INDEX <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.'||GlobalIndexes.INDEX_NAME||' REBUILD PARALLEL'; END LOOP; -- Rebuild Global Index Partitions FOR GlobalPartitionedIndexes IN (SELECT ip.index_name, ip.partition_name, ip.partition_position, ip.status FROM all_indexes ai, all_part_indexes ap, all_ind_partitions ip WHERE ai.table_owner = '<?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>' AND ai.table_name = 'W_ORDERS_F' AND ai.table_owner = ap.owner AND ai.index_name = ap.index_name AND ai.table_name = ap.table_name AND ai.index_name = ip.index_name AND ai.partitioned = 'YES' AND ap.locality = 'GLOBAL' AND ip.status = 'UNUSABLE' ORDER BY ip.index_name, ip.partition_position ) LOOP EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'ALTER INDEX <?=odiRef.getSchemaName("Warehouse", "D") ?>.'||GlobalPartitionedIndexes.INDEX_NAME||' REBUILD PARTITION '||GlobalPartitionedIndexes.PARTITION_NAME||' PARALLEL'; END LOOP; END;
Rebuild global indexes on partitioned table
